blocks.name: Fusion Table
blocks.description:
Main mod workstation.

Has 2 fusion slots and 8 fusion craft slots - total 10 inputs and 1 output. You can craft only 1 item at a time.

Gives a custom profession to villagers (see Other section).

blocks.name: Energy Condensator
blocks.description:
Auto charging station for elemental items.

Player can put or grab items on right click. Block inventory can contain one item of any type, it will be rendered on top of block.

If item is elemental, block will start working and increasing energy by 1 point each 72 ticks. Charging will be progressing faster, if energy providers placed around in radius of 2 blocks, similar to enchanting table leveling.
